bug.author: howl-anderson
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>URL(s) with the issue:</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/load_data/tf_records>https://www.tensorflow.org/tutorials/load_data/tf_records</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Description of issue (what needs changing):</denchmark-h>
in the context
The tf.train.Feature message type can accept one of the following three types (See the .proto file. Most other generic types can be coerced into one of these.
Note: the link of .proto file is incorrect. It should be
The tf.train.Feature message type can accept one of the following three types (See the .proto file for reference). Most other generic types can be coerced into one of these.

comments.comment: Closing this issue since the associated PR has been merged. Feel free to reopen if the problem still persists. Thanks!
